title: Someone in the Shadows
description: Icarus is a handsome, incognito vampire that lives undetected amongst humans. He has never been attracted to a female human that is until he meets Ruth: a dark-haired, amber-eyed beauty.  Besotted with Ruth, Icarus reveals his secret - a secret he is forbidden by the Elders to tell to humans. The Elders aren't happy to hear that a human knows about the vampire race though only time will tell what action they will take...  Meanwhile, Ruth is desperate to take their relationship further but a physical relationship means Ruth turning into a vampire herself - or worse, death.  Will their relationship survive the threat of danger, retribution and even death?  This risque 10,000 word novella is the second installment in Calla Clarke's exciting erotic vampire romance series, 'The Icarus Trilogy'.  WARNING: This book contains adult material! 18+
author: Calla Clarke
